html:
stretched forth the heavens/laid the foundations of the earth. In Genesis we read of God's creative powers, "In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth" (Gen. 1:1), dividing the light from the darkness. He laid the foundations of earth by causing dry land to appear and by bringing forth plants on the land (Gen. 1:9, 11-12). The God of creation would certainly also have power to fulfill his promises of deliverance and blessing to Zion.

fury of the oppressor. The enemy, both temporal and spiritual (Satan and his hosts), no matter how ferocious, is as nothing when compared to the Lord and his power.
